rules.description: Press Right Command to toggle Vimish navigation

to_if_alone.shell_command: osascript -e 'display notification "Press [⌃] to switch on/off" with title "-- Vimish Navigation [On] --"'
osascript -e 'display notification "Press [⌃] to switch on/off" with title "-- Vimish Navigation [Off] --"'

rules.description: H/J/K/L -> ← ↓ ↑ →, PgUp, PgDn, Home, End -> u d o n
